ModMetaData.name: AutoPriorities
ModMetaData.author: LokiVKlokeNaAndoke
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a window that allows you to automatically set work priorities for a specified number of pawns.
How it works: All pawns are sorted before assigning tasks so that the highest skill gets the job first. The mod also considers jobs that do not require any skills; in such cases, the pawn with the fewest skilled jobs assigned receives the unskilled job first.
NOTE: 1. Compatible with Fluffy's Worktab. 2. Mods that add job types are supported. 3. It is safe to add or remove from existing saves.
GitHub: https://github.com/LokiVKlokeNaAndoke/RimWorld_Mod_AutoPriorities
